description: Renovators at the Nazi concentration camp complex found the hidden items in a chimney in Block 17.
title: Auschwitz: Hidden objects found at concentration camp
title_page: Auschwitz: Hidden objects found at concentration camp - BBC News
maintext: Why the prisoners would hide the items remains uncertain. But a press release from Austria's National Fund says that possible reasons could include "making and repairing clothes, locksmithing or to prepare for an escape" - or even for use to barter with other prisoners.
